questions.question: I …………………. him yesterday.
questions.description: The present perfect cannot be used with past time expressions.

questions.question: We …………………. to the park last week.
You must ……………………. the instructions.
questions.description: To listen to is to pay attention to hear.

questions.question: Her dad died two years ……………………
questions.description: Ago is used to count from a present moment to a past moment.

questions.question: I …………………… to the boss about my holiday.
questions.description: When there is no time reference, the present perfect is more commonly used to talk about finished events.

questions.question: He was …………………… for murder.
questions.description: The past tense of hang is hanged when we are talking about killing someone by hanging.

questions.question: He …………………… the pictures on the wall.
He …………………… under the tree.
questions.description: When lie means to recline, its past tense is lay.

questions.question: I heard them ........................... in the other room.
questions.description: Hear is followed by an infinitive without to.

questions.question: He reached the station after the train ……………………..
questions.description: We use the past perfect for the earlier of two past actions.
